backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko canister with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping a modal save-to-memories feature to its source file and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files for reference or tooling.
frontend/DEVELOPMENT.md: Developer guide outlining prerequisites and steps for local development and deployment.
frontend/env.json: Runtime config defining the Internet Identity URL.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and extensive OKLCH theme variables plus UI styling.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell loading fonts and mounting the React app.
frontend/README.md: Project overview describing features and linking to development instructions.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component rendering the dashboard and global toast system.
frontend/src/components/CenteredNotifica: Autoâ€‘dismiss centered notification component rendered above modals.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyCompletio: Large celebration modal handling selfie capture, uploads, compositing, and memory saving.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyMemorySha: Dropdown providing social and system sharing actions for a monthly memory image.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyProgressD: SVG donut visualization showing monthly progress as a circular meter.
frontend/src/components/MonthSelectionMo: Modal for choosing a month with confirm and cancel actions.
frontend/src/components/YearlySummaryTab: Renders a yearly summary table of completed goals with checkbox tracking, monthly stats, and celebration/memory modals. Manages localStorage state, monthly grouping, and UI interactions.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity authentication and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
Wraps useCamera to ensure video preview readiness and provides camera control, readiness checks, and photo capture for celebration selfies.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity login, identity loading, and state management using DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file exporting nothing because no backend queries are needed.
frontend/src/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, theming, and component styles including enhanced checkbox and statistics table styling.
frontend/src/lib/celebrationImageComposi: Generates a Polaroid-style composite image by combining a selfie with an overlay badge and provides helpers for image loading and file-to-dataURL conversion.
frontend/src/lib/monthlyMemoryShare.ts: Utilities for sharing monthly memory images via Web Share API, with fallbacks for downloading, sharing links, and copying text.
frontend/src/lib/monthlyMemoryStorage.ts: Handles saving, retrieving, and clearing monthly memory images in localStorage, including fetching all saved months.
frontend/src/lib/months.ts: Defines a constant list of month names and a corresponding Month type.
frontend/src/lib/yearlySummaryCheckboxSt: Manages loading, saving, and clearing yearly summary checkbox states in localStorage with validation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that sets up React rendering with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers.
frontend/src/pages/GoalsDashboard.tsx: Implements a goals dashboard UI with categorized goal cards, goal management, and yearly summary integration.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, typography, animations, and enabling plugins.
frontend/tsconfig.node.json: TypeScript config for Node-side tooling, specifying module resolution and compiler options.
frontend/vite.config.ts: Vite config enabling React, environment variables, path aliases, a dev proxy, and build settings.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing existing features, new requests, versioning, and general project state.
